description: The Director of Integration, Military Personnel Generation Group (MPGG), was tasked to innovate recruitment methods and to reverse the decline of applications to the CAF as well as to integrate the multitude of recruitment efforts taking place within Military Personnel Command (MPC) and beyond.

### Business Requirement

The Department of National Defence requires a suitable contractor for the modernization and integration of recruitment methods across Military Personnel Command (MPC) and the broader Defence organization.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will:
1. Conduct a current-state review of existing initiatives
2. Develop an integrated modernization strategy for the next 1-3 years
3. Align the strategy, vision, and roadmap with relevant stakeholders
